response.original_title: 木更津体育大学 相撲部女子「男には負けたくない、絶対に」土俵に立ったら、表情を崩さず何をされても取り組みする！！新入部員編
response.overview: Following the initial visit to Kisarazu Physical Education University's women’s sumo club, the production team returns to document the arrival of two new female members. Though still shy about exposing their bodies, the newcomers endure intense training, including oil sumo and the newly introduced double-headed vibrator sumo. The coach demands focus and combativeness: "Stick out your butt! Lock eyes with your opponent! Stay focused!". The story highlights the clash between Kokoro Ayase and Moa Wakatsuki, who battle not only their rivals but also their own inner limits.
response.title: Kisarazu Taiiku Daigaku Sumo-bu Joshi "Otoko ni wa Maketakunai, Zettai ni" Dohyo ni Tattara, Hyojo o Kuzusazu Nani o Saretemo Torikumi suru!! Shinnyu Buin-hen

titles.title: Kisarazu Taiiku Daigaku Sumō-bu Joshi "Otoko ni wa Maketakunai, Zettai ni" Dohyō ni Tattara, Hyōjō o Kuzusazu Nani o Saretemo Torikumi suru!! Shinnyū Buin-hen
